html:
12.21.18  8:51 am   oh hey, quick theory question. If I play the progression Bbsus2 to F to C (in the key of C), is there a way to notate the sus2 in roman numerals? Like bviisus2 or bVIIsus2? (bass notes Bb down to F down to C)

     i personally can't stand roman numerals for chords, but that's just because i haven't spent any time learning to read them, and arabic numbers (1,2,3) work fine for me. but it would be bVIIsus2 i think, assuming VII means 7 which i think it does

12.21.18  5:49 am   The game you mention at the end of best friends with my own front door, and the one you sing about in the chorus of just did a bad thing - are these the same game?

     feels a bit different

12.21.18  5:07 am   What do you think about good old stuff?

     it has been curated for a long time

12.21.18  2:58 am   whats your favorite christmas ornament?

     colorado pine tree

12.21.18  2:14 am   Everyone keeps talking about this new song called "Just Did a Bad Thing" but I can't find it! Not on your songs page, not on YouTube, not anywhere. Where is it???

     in purgatory

12.21.18  1:40 am   If you were to combine your favorite song with your least favorite song what would the title be?

     kiss you by one direction

12.21.18  12:34 am   Whats a weird/intense synchronicity youve experienced and dont mind sharing?

     was born into a world full of billions of other people who are physically almost exactly the same as me

12.21.18  12:17 am   Do you think dreams are more about the unconscious trying to xonvey something to the conscious part or more random?

     some of both

12.20.18  11:41 pm   how does the process of whipping up a new song differ from touching up one from the backlog?

     on a brand new song there would possibly be less work to be done, on the writing. so it could be quicker, unless the old song was so bad that i had to rescue and fix the entire thing

      does the videomaking process differ in any way depending on whether the song is made from scratch or already partly written?

     no, because i finish the writing before producing anything

12.20.18  10:38 pm   if ever did happen to make an album what do you think would be a good name for it?

     that depends which album it is

12.20.18  10:22 pm   THIS IS NOT AN ENVIRONMENT CONDUCIVE FOR WRITING AND COMPLETING PROJECTS EVERYONE IN THIS HOUSE JUST SITS AROUND AND TALKS AND WATCHES PETTY FIGHTS ON THEIR PHONES and then starts them in real life HOW SHALL I GET OUT OF THIS PLACE AND HOW SHALL I DO WHAT I NEED TO DO AS LONG AS I HAVE TO BE HERE

     ah it sounds like you need to develop a force field. and the good news is you already have achieved bragging rights for being more ambitious than the average person, and you can carry that with you for years to come

12.20.18  9:52 pm   did the idea for the schedule come about on Newn Year's Eve 2013?

     no

      is that why it's your favorite holiday?

     new years eve is absolutely not my favorite holiday. i don't particularly like it. there can be quite a bit of pandemonium

12.20.18  9:52 pm   music doesn't exist anymore. i used up the rest of the supply. sorry for the inconvenience. 

     some people know how to make music

12.20.18  9:32 pm   did you ever get uncomfortable when you were researching the nanking massacre?

     yes and i am still uncomfortable from it

12.20.18  8:55 pm   how does one paint their brain?

     with thoughts, and thinking

12.20.18  8:32 pm   Can you recommend a song similar to bruce hornbys c song? I love the voicings in that track

     your best bet would be some of the piano intros to other bruce hornsby songs. every little kiss, harbor lights, the show goes on

12.20.18  8:15 pm   What do you think is something that if everyone knew or atleast pondered,we would all be doing better in a global scale? 

     we all could be each other

12.20.18  8:08 pm   I'm learning music and I hate hearing about what "isn't allowed" like, it just makes me want to make a masterpiece that is nothing BUT everything that you're not supposed to do. Does that make sense?

     yes

      Can you relate at all?

     yes

12.20.18  8:02 pm   Biiiiiiiiil! (Me again) I don't understand Intervals when it comes to Augmented, Major, Minor, and Diminished. Because how can an interval of M6 suddenly be minor or Augmented when there are no sharps or flats affecting it? Am I just dumb because I don't get it? 

     can you give me some more specifics on your situation

12.20.18  7:55 pm   i saw a voicing for a Bmin7 (b5) that went B E F A. it was also notated as Fmaj7 (b5)/B. i'm confused because there is also clearly an 11 in that voicing that isn't accounted for in the notation

     i thought you said it was accounted for in the notation, but not the chord symbol... actually you said there were 2 chord symbols and one of them did account for it

12.20.18  5:59 pm   How do you not let expectations paralyze you

     you must find the sweet spot

12.20.18  4:36 pm   if it's so important for you to have the exact date your content was created/finished on your website, rather than the date it was published, why do your song dates still show the same day as the videos? Clearly you have to finish them one or two days early for them to come out the same day as the videos. For example "just did a bad thing" came out today, 12/17 but you will probably list it as 12/18 in the song page. What gives?

     almost everything in existence has a range of dates that are significant for it. for example, these questions have 2 dates/times that would be significant: the time you asked it, and the time i answered it. (actually this question seems to have 3 dates associated with it, because it appears to be copied from a question composed around 12/17) but for simplicity's sake i must choose 1 date which i think is most appropriate, based on the type of content it is. showing 2 or more dates for 1 thing is just too many numbers to take in, and does not appear clear at all. so depending on what type of content it is, the date which i feel best represents that piece of content may be derived a different way. the making of this website has been an ongoing attempt to organize things as clearly as i can, but again and again the reality will defy the categorization system in subtle ways. but i can hardly complain about that because that's just something our world loves to do. also the song was released on 12/18 not 12/17. but with advanced technology it may have been transmitted to you from a more easterly time zone which may have reached 12/18 sooner than you

12.20.18  3:36 pm   would you ever consider putting some of your older music on Spotify? Songs like I'm crazy/ it's raining? 

     yes

12.20.18  3:29 pm   what would you change about school if you had the chance

     make it a little more colorful i guess

12.20.18  3:20 pm   Why is the video for just did a bad thing taking almost twice as long as the last few videos?

     because i suck

      Is it extra special? 

     no

12.20.18  2:44 pm   Hey don't even worry about my question. How bout you just vent your frustrations right here in whatever terms you'd like. Don't even worry about it

     that god damn bowling ball trampoline analogy is atrocious

12.20.18  2:35 pm   do pedestrians always have the right of way?

     actually physically no. but it is polite to let them have it, in practice, to compensate

12.20.18  2:34 pm   hi_ i try to recreate the songs i like by ear (drums bass,everything if i can) but i sometimes have a hard time figuring out the tempo and time signature. like in "we could just get high" or "i'm confused". and sometimes time signature changes in the middle and its more confusing. what do i do to understand time better

     first it might help to start out with music not made by someone who spent a large portion of their childhood listening to dave weckl music

12.20.18  2:28 pm   what do i ask?

     what to ask

12.20.18  1:03 pm   Thoughts on uppercase letters?

     they are guaranteed to work in extremely plaintext situations, even where all other styles fail

12.20.18  11:03 am   What Happened to Malaysia Airlines Flight 370?

     i think the pilot was unfortunately in a very very bad mood and decided to crash the plane into the indian ocean. pilots are usually not supposed to be in such a bad mood while flying, but there may have been some mix up

12.20.18  10:36 am   I love the rhythmic elements to your songs, they sound very deliberate and calculated. Do you have as much passion for interesting rhythms as you do for harmony?

     yes

      Or do you see it as all the same kinda thing

     no, but they are very powerful when used together

12.20.18  10:28 am   How does one balance the desire to be a well-rounded person with the desire to be the absolute best at a very specific thing

     you could be the absolute best at being well rounded. like Tom Hanks

12.20.18  10:03 am   so what inspires you to make your vids?

     it makes me feel powerful to have my thoughts and/or feelings appear in someone else's mind

12.20.18  8:48 am   Do you ever feel really proud of what you accomplish (productively, not destructively) during a manic cycle and it kinda takes away any lingering shame about having them in the first place?

     yes

12.20.18  7:46 am   Do you get satisfaction from answering questions, and if so why?

     the best thing is i get to stay up to date on the latest memes and also any really important news, like whether or not the world is on fire

12.20.18  5:43 am   do you ever feel like half of the questions you are asked are just passive aggressive attacks?

     less than half, but some of them are

12.20.18  5:35 am   how do you get better at something

     try doing it a lot, unless it is something where failure would be too dangerous to risk, in which case you should use a simulator

12.20.18  5:19 am   what does 12 half steps mean in octave

     listen a half step is the amount each note gets higher

12.20.18  1:33 am   how do i keep my children away from the plutonium in my backyard

     you must put it in the front yard

12.20.18  1:25 am   I want to ask you a pony question but I don't know anything about ponies. Where should I begin learning about ponies so I can ask you a pony question? 

     i don't know, i don't know anything about them. the only thing i thought i knew about them i recently found out is not true so i guess i'll have to start all over again

12.20.18  12:30 am   Was writing, recording and releasing "Just Did a Bad Thing" cathartic for you?

     not any more or less than any other song i have done

12.20.18  12:23 am   what do i tell friends when they are feeling sad?

     you could tell them stories about other people's sadnesses, and happinesses

12.20.18  12:11 am   Heya Bill. I think part of what makes your videos stand out is that you do a good job combining audible, visual, and textual interest, without overwhelming the viewer. So I was wondering, do you have a preferred means of receiving information, e.g., watching, hearing, reading, or all of the above?

     i prefer watching great videos that absolutely knock my socks off, and don't waste time

12.20.18  12:06 am   When i think bill wurtz philosophy to me that means shorter goals till you get the job done. Was there an inspiration for that method to get shit done or was it something that you slowly cane to realize worked for you(and may too for all)?

     just common sense i guess. trying to eat a big shoe, eventually anyone will realize they must take small bites and if the bites are too big you must simply take smaller bites

12.19.18  11:26 pm   I've got free time for the next month-ish. Any way I could make your life/ work easier? 

     you wanna write a converter that converts rtf into html, in the formatting i use on the notebook page?

12.19.18  11:10 pm   are all your videos parts of a huge story?

     they demonstrate the story of me learning how to make them and making them

12.19.18  10:47 pm   Have you really had this website since 2000?

     no

12.19.18  10:46 pm   Hi Bill. I'm interested in music theory and I want to learn more about it (specifically about things like scales and chords etc.). How should I go about it? Should I do it at school if it means I can't do other subjects I enjoy like science and maths and my grades might suffer because I'm currently not very good at it? Are there YouTube channels I can learn it from? Should I read books? How did you obtain your knowledge of music theory? Sorry for so many questions. I like your videos a lot!

     i think nowadays the interenet is probably the best place to learn most things. but if it's music, don't forget to apply absolutely everything you learn to all your favorite songs, and don't forget to have fun learning things for yourself, based on all your favorite songs

12.19.18  10:20 pm   how do i stop using the word "you" in my songs

     why would you want to do that. you is the best word to use in songs
